Chapter 2 本书使用软件信息

Chapter 2 本书使用软件信息 本书使用的R session信息列在下面: xfun::session_info(c( 'blogdown', 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown', 'htmltools', 'reticulate', 'rticles', 'flexdashboard', 'learnr', 'shiny', 'revealjs', 'pkgdown', 'tinytex', 'xaringan', 'tufte' ), dependencies = FALSE) ## R version 3.6.2 (2019-12-12) ## Platform: x86_64-apple-darwin15.6.0 (64-bit) ## Running under: macOS Catalina 10.15.3 ## ## Locale: en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8 / C / en_US.UTF-8 / en_US.UTF-8 ## ## Package version: ## blogdown_0.18 bookdown_0.18 flexdashboard_0.5.1.1 ## htmltools_0.4.0 knitr_1.28 learnr_0.10.1 ## pkgdown_1.4.1 reticulate_1.14 revealjs_0.9 ## rmarkdown_2.1 rticles_0.14 shiny_1.4.0 ## tinytex_0.20 tufte_0.5 xaringan_0.15 ## ## Pandoc version: 2.3.1 包的名字使用黑体(例如:rmarkdown).函数后面会跟着括号(比如:blogdown::serve_site()).“Rmd”是Rmarkdown文件的扩展名,同时也是R markdown的缩写. This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandoc’s Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\). The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github:
